channel.title: Malty Media Podcasts
channel.description: Podcasts of the Malty Media Radio Show on Active89FM - Ambient / Psychedelic / Retro / Electro / YouTubeo Musical Comedy from Wellington, New Zeland.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media podcasts
channel.itunes:author: Malty Media
channel.itunes:summary: Podcasts of the Malty Media Radio Show on Active89FM - Ambient / Psychedelic / Retro / Electro / YouTubeo Musical Comedy from Wellington, New Zeland.

item.title: Malty Media Radio Show (Radio) 26 January 2010
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show (Radio) 26 January 2010
item.itunes:summary:
Our radio show devoted, reflexively, to radio. Frequencies were collated, recorded, transmitted and recorded again. Now you can download these frequencies over the net. If you use wireless, there will be even more radio involved.
Radio-activity - it's in the air, for you and me.
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Radio Show (Germany) 8 December 2009
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show (Germany) 8 December 2009

itunes:summary.p: This show focused on matters Germanic, mit glitzerstrahl! We broadcast a wealth of Deutsche electronica, the odd (very odd) foray into Teuton Funk, plus a bit of electroacoustic, industrial, and, frankly, Rammstein. Plus Klaus Kinski as (sorry, *is*) Jesus.
No Bach, unfortunately. Or Wagner, thankfully

item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Show (Friends and Relations) 24 November 2009
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Show (Friends and Relations) 24 November 2009
item.itunes:summary: We in-crowded it with our friends. Stuart flew solo in the studio with the help of tracks collated by a seriously laryngitic Michael. Our friends were served. In many senses.
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Radio Show (Essence) 10 November 2009
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show (Essence) 10 November 2009
item.itunes:summary: Our essence show really got to the nub of the matter, considering what is Soul? (Answer: I don't know), as well as figs and other matters quite quintessential.
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Show (Handclaps) 29 September 2009
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Show (Handclaps) 29 September 2009
item.itunes:summary: This show Aquaboogie pleaded post-wedding exhaustion and Bignificent D beamed in from Auckland to take over the reigns. Every track played had claps in them, synthetic if not natural, and the show took in the gamut from John Farnham to MIA.
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Show (Messages) 15 September 2009
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Show (Messages) 15 September 2009
item.itunes:summary: With this show we did our best to stay on message. Although perhaps our message was its medium. What does that even mean?
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.itunes:summary: This show was our tribute to the synth and many of its miraculous magicians.

item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Show (The Sea)
item.itunes:summary: Our mighty sea set featured numerous narratives nautical, plus the odd robot penguin. Very odd...
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Radio Show (THE FUTURE)
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show (THE FUTURE)
item.itunes:summary: We presented a vision of how we wanted the future to be, largely using music over 20 years old. Then we presented a dystopian future of how we thought music would turn out. Not quite as grim as it sounds....
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Show (Travel) 9 June 2009
item.itunes:summary: Featuring field recordings from Europe and Asia, Elton John, Iranian Travel Agents, Kookaburras, and much, much more!
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show (Summer) 3 March 2009

item.title: Malty Media Radio Show 17 February 2008 (Japan)
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show 17 February 2008 (Japan)
item.itunes:summary: We billed this show, themed "Japan", as likely to "feature baffling advertising, frenetic pop songs, movie soundtracks, and field recordings". I think we were true to our word, although there was also a lot of rather ambient stuff from Japanese producers...
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Radio Show 3 February 2008 (Night)
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show 3 February 2008 (Night)
item.itunes:summary: Semi theme was water. Featuring the talents of: John Martyn, KLF, Liquid Liquid, Adrien 75. This Mortal Coil, the Marketing Executives for Camel Cigarettes, a man who is very enthusiastic about bats, a man who is a bit non-committal about native birds, Brian Eno, the eternal Ofra Haza, the Irresistable Force, Stevie Wonder and much much more!
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Radio Show 20 January 2009 (Water)
item.itunes:summary: The first show in what should now be a fortnightly affair. Unles we find we can't hack the pace. Semi theme was water.

item.title: Multimedia from Malty Media @ Katipo
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Multimedia from Malty Media @ Katipo
item.itunes:summary: This is a selection of our Katipo set 23 January 2008. The set order is something like this: - Japanese new age from the 80s, courtesy of the intriguingly named Interior - an Aquaboogie work in progress - a recording of a frog pond in Vietnam - a Jet Jaguar number, 'Red', which'll be on his Monotonik EP release - the aforementioned Lilburn / Presley surprise, - Irresistible Force's 'The Lie In King' - Pierre Omaar's 'Fast Jet To Belize'
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie

item.title: Malty Media Live at the Session
item.itunes:author: Malty Media
item.itunes:subtitle: Malty Media Live at the Session
item.itunes:summary: In the last week of New Zealand Music Month 2008 we did an interview and a loose set of "original" (ahem) material on Active's The Session show. Thanks to Pete & Andy who host the Session for inviting us to play. Pete was on interviewing duties...
item.itunes:keywords: Ambient, Electronica, Krautrock, Psychedelia, retro children's TV, 1970s, kosmische, cosmic rock, hippie nonsense, satori, Jet Jaguar, Aquaboogie
